mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_type AS "userType", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.password AS "password", a.email AS "email", a.phone AS "phone", a.photo AS "photo", a.login_ip AS "loginIp", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.last_login_time AS "lastLoginTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( id, user_type, login_name, password, email, phone, photo, login_ip, create_time, last_login_time, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userType}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{photo}, #{loginIp}, #{createTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_type = #{userType}, login_name = #{loginName}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, photo = #{photo}, login_ip = #{loginIp}, create_time = #{createTime}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
